name: Import Roads From OpenStreetMap
description: Download all bus-passable roads within a range centered on a lat-lon coordinate from OpenStreetMap.

params.name: Radius
params.help: Radius in meters, centered on (lat, lon), within which to get roads

params.name: Latitude
params.help: Latitude of coordinate around which to look for roads

params.name: Longitude
params.help: Longitude of coordinate around which to look for roads

outputStageFormats.name: Roads
outputStageFormats.help: A json file containing the downloaded roads
